summary: Email chain between attorney Gloria Allred and Assistant U.S. Attorney Maurene regarding logistical arrangements for Epstein victims to attend or listen to Ghislaine Maxwell's bail hearing on July 14, 2020. Allred represents multiple victims, including Erika Braukis, who decided to fly in for the hearing.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Attorney representing multiple victims of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell; corresponds with prosecutors about victim access to Maxwell's bail hearing.

persons.name: Maurene
persons.context: Assistant U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York coordinating with Gloria Allred regarding victim seating and access to the bail hearing.

persons.name: Erika Braukis
persons.context: Client of Gloria Allred who decided to fly in to attend the video hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell's bail hearing.

persons.name: Wendy Olsen
persons.context: U.S. Attorney who forwarded Gloria Allred's initial inquiry to Maurene regarding access to the bail hearing phone line.

persons.name: G. Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell, the defendant whose bail hearing is the subject of the correspondence.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Deceased financier and accused sex trafficker; victims represented by Gloria Allred were victimized by him.

connections.description: Allred is the legal representative for victim Erika Braukis, arranging her attendance at Maxwell's bail hearing.
Correspondence regarding procedural arrangements for victims to access Ghislaine Maxwell's bail hearing.
Allred represents multiple victims who allege victimization by Jeffrey Epstein.
Allred represents victims who also allege victimization by Ghislaine Maxwell, though outside the indictment's timeframe.
Erika Braukis is identified as an Epstein victim.

events.title: Bail Hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Bail hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell scheduled, with arrangements being made for victim access via phone line and in-person video feed.

locations: Southern District of New York, 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
Allred, Maroko & Goldberg, 6300 Wilshire Blvd., Suite 1500, Los Angeles, CA 90048
keyFacts: Gloria Allred represents multiple victims of Jeffrey Epstein, some of whom also allege victimization by Ghislaine Maxwell.
Victim Erika Braukis decided to fly in to attend the video feed of Ghislaine Maxwell's bail hearing on July 14, 2020.
Prosecutors offered to arrange priority seating for victims attending the hearing in person due to COVID-19 social distancing requirements.
Access to a separate audio phone line for the hearing was limited to parties and victims covered by the indictment, causing concern for other victims.
Some of Allred's clients who are Epstein victims were unwilling to speak to prosecutors about their experiences at that time.
